publicationStmt.publisher: Yoav Cohen and Maya Ben Tov, Ben-Gurion University

lg.head: When I Won't Fear of Losing it All

lg.l: Until I have met you I wasn't even aware that my heart was so badly hurt I thought I was just getting old or that there is no true love there at all small hearts have hurt me so I've found a my ways to stay away from burning emotions forgetting that pushing the pain away was taking the chance of feeling joy When I let myself sink in all the good that is you When I won't fear of losing it all that is when I will know my heart is finally cured and its safe to let my feelings show Silent like a cat you sneaked slowly into my life and I never saw it coming but now it feels like you could be the one who holds the key to my heart When I let myself sink in all the good that is you When I won't fear of losing it all that is when I will know my heart is finally cured and its safe to let my feelings show So I raise a toast for the day I will let myself open in every way hoping the heat of the drink will melt all the doubts and send them away Now I let myself sink in all the good that is you and I don't fear of losing it all could my heart be finally cured is it safe to let my feelings show?
